Inputs.Query: select u_multicol_tbl2.cola, u_multicol_tbl2.colb from u_multicol_tbl2 where (cola, colb) in ::fkc_vals4 and (cola) not in (('bar')) for update
update /*+ SET_VAR(foreign_key_checks=OFF) */ u_multicol_tbl3 set cola = null, colb = null where (cola, colb) in ::fkc_vals5
update u_multicol_tbl2 set cola = null, colb = null where (cola, colb) in ::fkc_vals4 and (cola) not in (('bar'))
update u_multicol_tbl1 as m set m.cola = 'bar' where m.id in ::dml_vals
